title: Not being able to launch the legecy client
body: ever since the new client has been released its been very laggy and slow,for no real reason, i have a better computer than a couple of my friends i play with and there client runs fine, anyways for the past few weeks ive been using the Legacy client but now whenever i click launch it just never launches,i now have 5, 5 minute timers before queing up because the new client freezes in champ select or says ive disconnected while loading in and my team re-makes, i dont know how to launch the old client correctly and ive already tried patching the new client twice

replies.body: If I understand correctly, you're specifically having problems loading the game- not the client?  Are you receiving any error messages?  What do you see exactly?  Let me know.

the main problem im having is not being able to play on the old client, i click the League logo on my desktop, it launches and everything is fine,i click on Launch legecy client in the bottom right of the sign in page of the new client, it launches and i hit launch on the old client before the sign in page but it never goes to the sign in page, i figured out the problem on the new client so it isnt that much of an issue anymore but i still like the old client because of its lack of bugs, hope i could explain that well sorry if i couldnt
: and i dont get an error it just never launches to the sign in page

There may be another way to return to the legacy client:

-  Create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

Glad everything is otherwise okay now!
